1: Sincere prayer receives faithful and righteous answers.
2: Extend mercy to all who live.
3: Live in light that renews and strengthens the soul.
4: My spirit remains strong and my heart stays full.
5: I reflect on past wonders and gain wisdom today
6: I reach out; my soul drinks refreshing life.
7: I receive swift help and sustaining presence lifts my spirit
8: I welcome morning love and follow the way with trust.
9: I seek refuge and find safety and deliverance.
10: I follow good guidance into upright living.
11: Righteousness renews life and lifts the spirit.
12: I serve and thrive in peace through mercy
